p.d: Two billionaires, Agenor-Agobar Poirier des Chapelles and Willigis Kittycly Junior, assisted by the most sought-after architects, each build a skyscraper, ever-higher and ever more luxurious. Just how far will they go? Regie: Fabienne Giezendanner (Schweiz, 2017) Drehbuch: Germano Zullo, Fabienne Giezendanner, based on "Les Gratte-Ciel" by Albertine Zullo, Germano Zullo. Genre: Kom√∂die Awards: official selection in many festivals
